top_comment.text:
Since people in the comments seem to need some clarification:

A boy band= a band with a group of singers that don't usually write their 
songs and don't play any instruments, they have people that play 
instruments for them at concerts.

An actual band= The band that plays their own instruments, the most common 
type has a lead singer, lead guitarist, bassist, and drummer. They almost 
always write their own songs.

One Direction= boy band and 5 Seconds of Summer= actual band.

There you have it.﻿

captions.text: - Well hello everyone!
My name is Tyler Oakley,
and as you guys know, every Tuesday
I have a new video.
But I’m starting a couple new things.
Like you guys may have seen,
I’ve been doing Q&A’s for a while,
but I want to mix those up
and maybe do some PO box videos,
which I’ve been doing.

And now I’m introducing
you to my new series
which is basically my new favorite things
of each month.
Oprah had her favorite things
and now I have my favorite things.

So let’s get into what
I’m loving this September.
Obviously I gotta give some love
to my friend Troye Sivan.
His new EP is incredible!
If you need new music, listen to it.
It is so good.
So summer is always award show season

and I have been going
to a lot of award shows,

as you guys have seen on,
like, Instagram and stuff.

But trying to have cute
outfits for each award show

is really difficult because
a lot of guys options
are kind of similar, and, uh,
kind of run of the mill standard.
Whether it’s like a black suit,
or a gray suit, or a blue suit.
So a fun way I have found to accessorize
and have playful fun with my
red carpet looks is pocket squares!
And this is one of my new favorite ones.
I think it’s from Top Shop.
I love it, and this is like something that
I’ve been collecting this year because

of all the award shows
that we’ve been going to.
Pocket squares, love ‘em!
Another thing that is a lifesaver
on the red carpets is these
Clean & Clean Oil Absorbing Sheets.
Basically I have, like, an oily face,
I’m sorry I’m not sorry.
It’s just my face.
It’s a great face!

It does all the things
that I need a face to do.
But sometimes it is a little oily,
which is not great on a carpet
or great during interviews,
so these are a lifesaver.
I keep them in my pocket, and you can
just, like, wipe all the oil off
in one little, quick, little, whatever.

But I’m sure there’s a
whole bunch of brands
you can get, but these are the ones
that I initially got.
I fell in love, they’re a lifesaver.
I don’t know if you have oily skin,
but this will help.
Perfect for red carpets.
I’ve also been trying to do
a lot of reading nowadays.

I am currently re-reading
‘Me Talk Pretty One Day’
and the best part about David Sedaris
is listening to his voice.
If you want to hear him read his chapters
it is just the funniest thing.

You can get your first
book free on audible
if you use audible.com/tyleroakley
but I recommend a David Sedaris book.
In particular, ‘Me Talk Pretty One Day.’
It’s one of my favorite ones from him
and I think you will, like, absolutely die
laughing because it is so hilarious.
The best thing about an author is when
you can hear their voice in the words
and then when you listen to the audiobook
it’s even better because
their voice is funny within itself.
Um, but David Sedaris is definitely
one of those people and if you
want to get his book, it’s for free.
If you use audible.com/tyleroakley
you get your first book free.

Um, like I said, you will
fall in love with him.
You’re welcome in advance!
My next thing is something that I got
from a flea market.
As you guys know, Joan Rivers
has unfortunately passed away recently,
and this is something that kind of shook
the YouTube community to the core because
Joan had kind of emerged as
a YouTuber herself with her show
‘In Bed with Joan.’
But when I saw her documentary
‘A Piece of Work’ on Netflix,
I fell in love with her and I was like,
“Oh my gosh.
“One of the funniest people ever.”
And so recently I was at a flea market
and I saw this, which is one of her
comedy specials on a record, a vinyl,
and I have a record player.
So I got this, I fell in love with it,
um, I just have such a respect
for her work ethic.
If you want to see more of her,

I highly recommend her
documentary on Netflix,
‘A Piece of Work.’
It was just a year in her life.

Not only one of my
favorite things this month,

but she is one of my
favorites of all time.
So go give her some love.

One thing that I am absolutely
in love with recently

that I kind of got from
you guys is something

that I have seen at,
like, tons of conventions.

Instead of taking a
selfie, sometimes you guys
have these, like, automatic cameras.
That are like, the um,
what is it called?
Like the Polaroids!
But they instantly print it out.
You can sign it or date it or whatever.
But I have this in my apartment
and it’s something that we always, like,
use if we’re just hanging out,
which I absolutely love.
Because it’s like a tangible thing.
Like when you take a picture on your phone
it kind of goes nowhere,
except Twitter or Instagram.
But to have, like, a stack of pictures
that are just mine, that I don’t
necessarily post online

is like a warm comforting
thing that I love!
If you want it, you should get one too.
One thing that I love right now

that none of you guys
will get or care about
is this marker. (laughs)
Nobody’s gonna care,
but I have been signing a lot of posters.

My ‘I Can’t Stop Watching
YouTubers’ posters.
It’s hard to find a marker
that doesn’t dry out immediately
and this is the best.
I don’t know where I got it.
I don’t know how I found it,
but it’s Uni Prockey,
um, they’re the best.
They don’t dry out at all
so I love them.
If you sign a lot of things
get this, I like it.
I feel like nobody cares about this
except for me, but you know what?
It’s one of my favorite things this month
so I’m gonna talk about it!
Speaking of award shows,
I actually just went to the Steamys
and I won two awards!
One of them was for activism,
which I feel like I share with you guys.
We have done a lot of really cool things
for the world on this channel,
so this is for you.
And then the other one is fan voted,
it was Entertainer of the Year.
So thank you for voting,
thank you for being a part of my life,
thank you for being a part of the things
that we do on this channel.
These are because of you guys.
So thank you.
My next favorite thing is something that,

uh, another thing that I
got from a flea market.
And this is this drawing.

I don’t know, I don’t
know, I just liked it.

I thought it was pretty,
and cute, and cool.

Um, and then also this
frame, which came separately.

I put them together at
the flea market, but
um, I think this is kind of the direction,
or a direction,
that I am going to be going
with redoing my room.
My bedroom.
So I might do, like, a bedroom tour?

If you guys want me to
do that let me know.
Stay tuned.

Next, because there is
no autumn in Los Angeles,
I am currently loving this candle.
It’s got one of those wicks that when

you light it it flickers
and, like, crackles.
Just like a campfire.

‘Bonfire Nights’ is the
official scent of it
and it’s just like, oh my God.
It smells like Lake Michigan,
a bonfire in the Fall,
and I miss it, I love it, so
one of my favorite things!

Another thing that I’m
loving is this journal.
Uh, and it’s not necessarily like a diary
or anything, but it’s a place for me to
construct my thoughts, put them down,

organize them, and kind of
get more clarity on life.

So if you feel like you
are always like a mess,

or you don’t really have
your life organized,

honestly getting just
like a moleskine journal
is gamechanging.
Just to be able to write stuff down,
or to remember things,
or to, like, anytime I have a podcast idea
or anytime that I have a video idea,
or anytime that I wanna just, like,
organize how I feel about something,
or a pro and con list,
or a to do list, it goes in here.
So if you feel like your life is a mess,
get one of these.
Another thing that one of my friends
is doing right now that is absolutely
impressive that I am just like
flabbergasted by because it’s like,
killing it, loving it.
It’s just the best thing in the world.
Is Hannah Hart’s new book,
‘My Drunk Kitchen.’
It’s a cookbook, but it’s got stories

and it’s got advice, and
it’s kind of just amazing.
Um, if you want to get it it’s in stores.
I keep seeing it in, like, actual stores.
Like Barnes and Noble,
it was on the Best Sellers shelf.
So if you want to get it
it’s just incredible.
Go get it. Give it some love.
Another thing that I am loving
right now is this hat.
I don’t think it’s a fedora,
so before you judge,
it’s just, like, a little beach hat.
If I’m going to, like, the pool,
or the beach or whatever,
because it’s summer
even though it’s September.
But it’s 106° today,
so I feel like I can still dress
like I’m like living for summer,
which is this.
Am I allowed to wear this?
I like it, I think it’s cute.
Speaking of cute headwear looks,

I have also been wearing
these bandanas a lot
because every YouTuber is, and I’m like,
“You know what, I want to try it.”
I saw Marcus wearing one and I was like,
“That’s cute!”
I feel like I’m in ‘5 Seconds of Summer,’
which y’all will deal with.
But what do you think?
Let me know what you think.
Can I wear this?
I think I’m gonna wear this.

And then my last thing
that I’m absolutely loving
is my new Team Internet shirt.

I am in love with these,
they’re like baseball tees.
They are the softest, cutest.

They come in maroon,
they come in baby blue,

so if you want to get one
of these the link is below.
But if you buy one send me a picture
of you being cute in it and you might
be my Person of the Week,
which means you’ll go right there.
If you want to see my latest video,
it is a collaboration with Michelle Obama,
click right there.
If you want to hear my latest podcast
click right there.

That’s also one of my
favorite things this month.
You guys have made it the number one

comedy podcast, which I
cannot thank you enough for.
Me and Korey have a ball making it,
so I hope you guys love it.
Um, but this episode is an interview

with Troye Sivan, which I
think you guys will like.

Go listen to it and give
it a rating on iTunes.
We really appreciate it.
But that is all I have for you guys today.
I hope you have a fabulous life,
and I will see you guys next time.
Later!

title: JOINING A BOY BAND?! | Tyler Oakley
